content: विषम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [विगतो विरुद्धो वा समः] {@--1@} Uneven, rough, rugged; पथिषु विषमेष्वप्यचलता <ls>Mu. 3. 3</ls>; व्यालाकीर्णाः सुविषमाः <ls>Pt. 1. 64</ls>; <ls>Me. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Irregular, unequal; <ls>Māl. 9. 43.</ls> {@--3@} Odd, not even. {@--4@} Difficult, hard to understand, mysterious; <ls>Ki. 2. 3</ls>; विषमाः कर्मगतयः <ls>Pt. 4. 50.</ls> {@--5@} Impassable, inaccessible; <ls>Ki. 2. 3</ls>, <ls>Bh. 3. 5.</ls> {@--6@} Coarse, rough. {@--7@} Oblique; <ls>Māl. 4. 2.</ls> {@--8@} Painful, troublesome; कांताविश्लेषदुःखव्यतिकरविषमे यौवने विप्रयोगः <ls>Bh. 3. 106</ls>; <ls>H. 4. 3.</ls> {@--9@} Very strong, vehement; <ls>Māl. 3. 9.</ls> {@--10@} Dangerous, fearful; <ls>Mv. 5. 56</ls>, <ls>Mk. 8. 1</ls>, <ls n="Mk. 8.">27</ls>, <ls>Mu. 1. 18</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">2. 20.</ls> {@--11@} Bad, adverse, unfavourable; <ls>Pt. 4. 16.</ls> {@--12@} Odd, unusual, unparalleled. {@--13@} Dishonest, artful. {@--14@} Intermittent, (as fever). {@--15@} Wicked. {@--16@} Different. --मः <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --मं {@--1@} Unevenness. {@--2@} Oddness. {@--3@} An inaccessible place, precipice, pit &c. {@--4@} A difficult or dangerous position, difficulty, misfortune; सुप्तं प्रमत्तं विषमस्थितं वा रक्षंति पुण्यानि पुरा कृतानि <ls>Bh. 2. 97</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Rough or uneven ground. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a figure of speech in which some unusual or incompatible relation between cause and effect is described; (said to be of four kinds; see <ls>K. P.</ls> Kārikās <ls n="K. P.">126</ls> and <ls n="K. P.">127</ls>). {@--7@} A kind of stanza or verse; भिन्नचिह्न चतुष्पादं विषमं परिकीर्तितम्. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Unequally, unevenly, unfairly, dangerously &c.
